punktiert.physics
Class VBoid

java.lang.Object
  punktiert.math.Vec
      punktiert.physics.VParticle
          punktiert.physics.VBoid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class VBoid
extends VParticle

An example how you can set up your own agent by combining/ implementing different beaviors. Here the BSwarm and the VTrail Class are simply added to an extended VParticle class

Field Summary
 BSwarm swarm
           
 VTrail trail
           
 
Fields inherited from class punktiert.physics.VParticle
behaviors, neighbors, radius
 
Fields inherited from class punktiert.math.Vec
x, y, z
 
Constructor Summary
VBoid(float x, float y)
          Creates a VBoid at position xy, z set to 0.0
VBoid(float x, float y, float z)
          Creates a VBoid at position xyz
VBoid(float x, float y, float z, float w)
          Creates a VBoid at position xyz with weight 1, default radius 1.0
VBoid(float x, float y, float z, float w, float r)
          Creates a VBoid at position xyz with weight , radius , default flocking values as in the Processing example "Flocking" by Daniel Shiffman
VBoid(Vec v)
          Creates a VBoid at the position of the passed in vector
VBoid(Vec pos, Vec vel)
          Creates a VBoid at the position of the passed in vector
VBoid(Vec pos, Vec vel, VParticleGroup group)
          Creates a VBoid at the position of the passed in vector, belonging to a specific group
